title: Stock picking in 2022? Goldman Sachs says these are the companies that should be on your radar.
text:
The S&P 500 beat both Dow, and Nasdaq in 2021 by the widest margin in 24 years. Here's what history says happens in 2022.

The S&P 500 beat both the Dow and the Nasdaq in a calendar year. Here's what the data shows about gains in the following year that that happens. See full story.

Can you run after age 50? These coaches, runners and a physical therapist explain why you should and how to do it safely.

Here are some tips and facts so you can hit the pavement and keep on running even as you age. See full story.

Goldman joins other big banks in urging employees to work from home amid omicron surge

Goldman Sachs Group Inc. on Sunday asked its employees to work from home until Jan. 18, the latest major bank to ask workers to stay away from the office amid a surge of COVID-19 cases due to the fast-spreading omicron variant. See full story.

Tesla shares jump in premarket as deliveries surge 87% in 2021, smash quarterly record

Tesla Inc. delivered more than 308,000 vehicles in the fourth quarter, blowing away analysts' expectations, and saw deliveries surge about 87% in a year that saw the electric-vehicle maker top $1 trillion in market cap for the first time. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Adam Osmond, a Connecticut man who gambled away a fortune on lottery games, warns about the risks of addiction See full story.
